channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

item.title: Report E-2023080079
item.description:
Report E-2023080079

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-23T18:12:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-14
  • City: KENNESAW
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On July 14, 2023, two (2) 50-gallon drums of cinnamyl nitril (UN3278) were leaking from the bungs and released approximately one (1) cup of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Restoration (ER) to remediate the impacted site. ER personnel deployed granular absorbents to the release. The crew them utilized hand tools to containerize all UN3278-impacted material in one (1) 5-gallon bucket.
